original_title: President to meet ruling faction political leaders
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Ranil Wickremesinghe will meet with the leaders of the political parties that formed the government.
A spokesperson for the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna said the meeting will take place on Wednesday (14) at 5 PM at the President's Office.

It is reported that the President's Office had officially invited the leaders of the political parties in government, including the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna, United National Party, and the Ceylon Workers Congress.
It is also reported that the objective of the meeting is to discuss the issue that arise in governance.
